spell_tooltip.description: Holy Word: Sanctify blesses the ground with divine light, causing all allies who stand within to be immune to all silence and interrupt effects. Lasts for 5 sec.
15% of all damage you take is stored. The stored amount cannot exceed 12% of your maximum health. The initial damage of your next Shadow Word: Pain deals this stored damage to your target.

Step into the shadows when you cast Fade, avoiding all attacks and spells for 1 sec.

Interrupt effects are not affected by Phase Shift.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 413,042 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 98,907 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 6 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 4%.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal, Heal, or Holy Word: Serenity.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Heal or Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 180,517 and dealing 236,815 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 189,995.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 2.4 million.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Heal or Flash Heal.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 13 yds for 666,431.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.

Chastises the target for 402,629 Holy damage and incapacitates them for 4 sec.

Cooldown reduced by 4 sec when you cast Smite or Holy Nova.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 46 yards for 129,027.
Increases the duration of Spirit of Redemption by 50% and the range of its spells by 50%.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
When Prayer of Mending jumps to a target affected by your Renew, that target is instantly healed for 39,038.

Heals all party or raid members within 46 yards for 1.4 million over 4.0 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
You regenerate mana 10% faster.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
While channeling Divine Hymn, place 2 stacks of Prayer of Mending on up to 3 allies within its range every 0.8 sec.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 46 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.2 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Renew reduces the cooldown of Sanctify by an additional 6 sec and heals for 120% more when cast, but has a 12 sec cooldown.
Gain a charge of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.
Your Holy Words extend the duration of Apotheosis by 1.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending has a 15% chance to not consume a charge when it jumps to a new target.
The cooldowns of your Holy Words are reduced by an additional 10% when you cast the relevant spells.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 40%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 30%.
Your Holy Words have a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Prayer of Mending.

When you use a Holy Word spell, you summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.
After your Prayer of Mending heals 50 times, gain Apotheosis for 8 sec.

Casting Halo also causes you to create a Halo around you at 100% effectiveness every 5 sec for 10 sec.

Additionally, the radius of Halo is increased by 10 yards.
Your healing done is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.
Allies healed by your Halo receive 2% increased healing from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Light.
Halo damage reduces enemy movement speed by 5% for 5 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.
Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.

Creating a Halo extends the duration of Apotheosis by 1 sec. If Apotheosis is not active, up to 6 seconds is stored.

While out of combat or affected by a loss of control effect, the duration of Apotheosis is paused for up to 20 sec.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 413,042 over 15 sec.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 97,188 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 6 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Purify additionally removes all Disease effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 86,737 Holy damage to enemies and up to 33,684 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 4%.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal, Heal, or Holy Word: Serenity.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Heal or Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 175,640 and dealing 232,584 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.

Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 2.3 million.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Heal or Flash Heal.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 13 yds for 657,372.

Cooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.

Chastises the target for 400,843 Holy damage and incapacitates them for 4 sec.

Cooldown reduced by 4 sec when you cast Smite or Holy Nova.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.
Holy Word: Chastise stuns the target for 4 sec and is not broken by damage.

Holy Word: Chastise causes your next 2 casts of Holy Fire to be instant, cost no mana, and incur no cooldown.

Refreshing Holy Fire on a target now extends its duration by 7 sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 46 yards for 129,247.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Increases the damage of Holy Fire by 30%.

Holy Fire deals 75% of its initial damage to all nearby enemies within 12 yards of your target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Heal restores up to 15% additional health, based on your missing mana.

Heals all party or raid members within 46 yards for 1.4 million over 4.0 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
You regenerate mana 10% faster.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 10%.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 46 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.2 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Gain a charge of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, or Power Word: Life by 40%. Lasts 30 sec.
Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.
Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
25% of healing done by Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life is replicated to the previous target you healed with those spells.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 40%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 30%.
Increases healing by 20% on friendly targets at or below 50% health.

Flash Heal reduces the cast time of your next Heal or Prayer of Healing within 20 sec by 30% and increases its healing done by 18%.

Can accumulate up to 4 charges.
After your Prayer of Mending heals 50 times, gain Apotheosis for 8 sec.
Your healing done is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.
Allies healed by your Halo receive 2% increased healing from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Light.
Halo damage reduces enemy movement speed by 5% for 5 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.
Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal, Heal, or Holy Word: Serenity.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 1.0% Mana.
Reduces the cooldown of Desperate Prayer by 20 sec.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.

A word of holy power that heals the target for 1.3 million. 

Only usable if the target is below 35% health.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 28% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 125% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 562,496, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed, you restore 0.5% of your maximum mana.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to a nearby enemy when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 6.1 million, split evenly among them.
Smite extends the duration of an active Atonement by 3.0 sec.
Increases the damage of Shadow Word: Pain by 30% and increases its duration by 4 sec.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 8% for 4 sec.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 2.5 million Holy damage to enemies or 8.3 million healing to allies over 4.8 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 2%.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 15%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.
